create.groupId: Group ID, maximum length of 64 characters. Supports combinations of uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
create.name: Group name, maximum length of 64 characters. Group names can be duplicated.
create.owner: Group Owner. Creator ID, defaults to the group owner ID. This user is automatically added to the group.

update.groupId: Group ID, maximum length of 64 characters. Supports combinations of uppercase and lowercase letters and numbers.
update.name: Group name, maximum length of 64 characters. Group names can be duplicated.

profileQuery.groupIds: Group ID, maximum of 50 at a time.

transferOwner.newOwner: ID of the new group owner

groupId_userIds.userIds: User IDs, maximum of 100 at a time

set.nickname: Group member nickname, maximum length of 64 characters

follow.followUserIds: Users I Follow ID, maximum of 100 users at a time

set.remarkName: Group member nickname, maximum length of 64 characters

1501.msg: Incorrect parameter type, please check the parameter type, should be {{type}}, currently is {{currentType}}

1004.msg: Signature error, please check if Appkey and Secret are correct
